channel.title: growth mindset on Miranda Zhang's Website
channel.description: Recent content in growth mindset on Miranda Zhang's Website

item.title: processing feedback update: successfully processed some of the most detailed feedback I've gotten yet!
item.description:
processing feedback update: successfully processed some of the most detailed feedback I’ve gotten yet!

things that actively helped:

  • imagining being a new homunculus (thanks, Olivia Jimenez!)
  • externalizing into action items (thanks, Ari Kagan!)

contextual things that seem difficult to replicate, but probably helped:

  • I decided on a job, which feels like gain that counterbalances this professional ’loss'
  • I went through several days that felt emotionally worse than this and/or I got some emotional/temporal distance
